description: Twin Cape is the entrance to the Grand Line where Reverse Mountain's canals deposit ships. It features a lighthouse maintained by Crocus and is home to Laboon, the giant Island Whale who waits there.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Enter the Grand Line
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully navigate down Reverse Mountain and arrive at Twin Cape, officially entering the Grand Line.

keyEvents.title: Laboon Appears at Twin Cape
keyEvents.description: The crew encounters Laboon blocking their path at Twin Cape, leading to their ship being swallowed.

reveals.information: Entry point to the Grand Line where Reverse Mountain deposits ships
Home to the Twin Cape Lighthouse maintained by Crocus

description: The inside of Laboon has been modified by Crocus to include an artificial island environment complete with sky, clouds, and ocean. This allows Crocus to live inside the whale and perform medical treatments on Laboon from within.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Swallowed by Laboon
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry is swallowed whole by Laboon, and the crew discovers the bizarre interior environment.

keyEvents.title: Meeting Crocus Inside Laboon
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats encounter Crocus relaxing inside Laboon's modified interior.

geography.terrain: Internal ocean with artificial island and sky

reveals.information: Laboon's interior has been surgically modified by Crocus to create a livable environment
Contains an artificial sky, clouds, and ocean ecosystem

name.japanese: リヴァース・マウンテン

description: Reverse Mountain is the entrance to the Grand Line from the four Blues. Ocean currents flow upward through canals in the mountain and then down into the Grand Line at Twin Cape.

keyEvents.title: Descending Reverse Mountain
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats complete their descent down Reverse Mountain into the Grand Line.

description: The Grand Line is the most dangerous ocean in the world, where the One Piece is said to be hidden. It's accessed through Reverse Mountain and is known for its unpredictable weather and powerful pirates.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Enter the Grand Line
keyEvents.description: The crew officially enters the Grand Line, beginning their true adventure.

keyEvents.title: First Grand Line Obstacle - Laboon
keyEvents.description: The crew immediately encounters their first obstacle in the Grand Line - the giant whale Laboon.

reveals.information: Laboon serves as the first obstacle pirates encounter when entering the Grand Line
